entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow mixed with rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
